'''Minecraft: Skin Studio''' was an app for {{w|iOS}} developed by [[57Digital]] which was initially released in October 14, 2012, allowing for the creation of [[skins]] for ''Minecraft:'' [[Java Edition|''Java'']] and [[Bedrock Edition|''Bedrock'']] editions.

== Purchase and availability ==
Minecraft: Skin Studio is available to buy on {{Wikipedia|App Store}} for $3.99.

The app is available on the following platforms:
* iPhone
* iPad
* iPod touch
* Mac
* Apple Vision

The app supporting following languages:
* English
* Dutch
* French
* German
* Italian
* Japanese
* Portuguese
* Russian
* Simplified Chinese
* Spanish

== Functional ==
There are several buttons in the application:
* Begin - provides various tools for editing skins. Finished skins can be ported to various editions of the [[Minecraft]], and also the skin can be posted in the Community Skins section.
* My Skins - provides a catalog of skins created by the user
* Community Skins - provides a catalog of skins, which has 3 categories - Featured, Popular and Latest, created by other users
* My Profile - provides the user with editable information about his account in the app.
